content.raw:
The test were failing due to the lack of vcpkg libraries in PATH. I’ve fixed it in release-tools and now … voilá only one is failing [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_render\_win/207/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/207/console).

There are a good bunch of messages `[Err] [d:\jenkins\workspace\ign_render_win\ws\ign-rendering\src\renderenginemanager.cc:225] Failed to load plugin [ignition-rendering0-ogre] : couldn't find shared library.` I’m not sure how bad they are but looks like we need to fix something.
content.html:
The test were failing due to the lack of vcpkg libraries in PATH. I’ve fixed it in release-tools and now … voilá only one is failing https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/207/console.

There are a good bunch of messages [Err] [d:\jenkins\workspace\ign_render_win\ws\ign-rendering\src\renderenginemanager.cc:225] Failed to load plugin [ignition-rendering0-ogre] : couldn't find shared library. I’m not sure how bad they are but looks like we need to fix something.

content.raw:
nice, thanks!

I'm telling ign-rendering to look for `ignition-rendering0-ogre` plugin in the [IGN\_RENDERING\_PLUGIN\_PATH](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/6b707dde514a5b2e0714c2e2dcce2bb65c4dcec4/CMakeLists.txt#lines-87) which points to `${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}.` Maybe we need to change that logic for Windows. I’ll look into it
content.html:
nice, thanks!

I'm telling ign-rendering to look for ignition-rendering0-ogre plugin in the IGN_RENDERING_PLUGIN_PATH which points to ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR}. Maybe we need to change that logic for Windows. I’ll look into it

content.raw:
got slightly further after updating the plugin path in this [commit](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/commits/d14065caa64552e3be21c1e6d0f8244e3ab21981):

[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign\_render\_win/208/console](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/208/console)

Now it’s complaining about ogre \+ opengl on windows.. Will continue debugging..

content.raw: I made a few changes in the [win\_plugin\_path](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/branch/win_plugin_path?dest=win_link#diff) branch and ign-rendering can now [successfully load ogre and run tests](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_render_win/224). A few tests are still failing so I’ll need to fix those. I’ll create a separate PR for all these Windows fixes and keep this PR simple.
content.html: I made a few changes in the win_plugin_path branch and ign-rendering can now successfully load ogre and run tests. A few tests are still failing so I’ll need to fix those. I’ll create a separate PR for all these Windows fixes and keep this PR simple.
